label: Knapsack For Hope
Description1: Knapsack for Hope protocol allow us to transfer data using commercial TV channels without obtaining new hardware
Description2: Knapsack for Hope is a satellite file casting technology that leverages common satellite equipment to deliver digital content without relying on access to the internet.
description:
#Reach beyond communication barriers
##About Knapsack For Hope
![About Knapsack For Hope](https://www.youtube.com/embed/RiOqq00Ika4)
 ###Knapsack for Hope protocol allow us to transfer data using commercial TV channels without obtaining new hardware
Knapsack for Hope is a satellite file casting technology that leverages common satellite equipment to deliver digital content without relying on access to the internet.
